content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), small-electric-pole(position x=7.5, y=-0.5), and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Connected to multiple pipes, including pipe at position(x=-7.5, y=23.5), pipe at position(x=-8.5, y=24.5), and pipe at position(x=-6.5, y=24.5)

### Furnace group at position(x~52, y~ -84 to -80)
Consists of multiple furnaces, including furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0), furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0), furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0), and furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Lab is not connected to power network

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place an entity before placing it
- Check the distance between the player position and the target position to ensure it is within the maximum allowed distance of 10

### Errors when placing entities in occupied or unplaceable locations
- Ensure the target location is not occupied by another entity or part of the terrain is not unplaceable (water) before attempting to place an entity
- Check for any entities already existing at the target position and remove them before continuing

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting to connect them
- Check the connection points of the entities to ensure they are correctly aligned and can be connected

### Errors when working with pipes and fluid systems
- Ensure the pipes are correctly connected to the fluid system and the offshore pump
- Check the fluid box and fluid systems to ensure they are correctly configured and not empty
